body.p: Weak consonants of the verba ult. inf. have to be transliterated as i̯ and u̯ respectively, even if they are followed by an inflectional affix (".y" or ".w", e.g. mri̯.y =f. In case of substantives derived from verbs of ult. inf. classes it is not written , e.g. “wꜣ.t” – “way”.
Endings of nisba-adjectives and inside a phonetically written dual are represented as “j”.
The two strokes "Z4" are to be written as "j"
Only phonemes expressed by a double “M17” are to be written as “y”.
